title: Temptation Only You Don’t Know - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Empires   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty
author: 리나리아L
description:
'Kill me, Lavella. Your only chance is now.' 

Lavela was convinced that she was a cold-blooded killer who never shed a tear. 

That is, until Iscka shows up, the one man she can't bring herself to kill. 
 

'You’ll have to live by my side for the rest of your life.'

This man didn’t only have a handsome face. 
'I'm going to make you empress.' 

He must’ve been crazy.

I’ve helped you become emperor, and now you're repaying me like this? 

Will Lavella be able to escape from Iscka's temptation?>
